attributes.action: Ban media using full the names of those  who are arrested but NOT yet charged!!!!!
attributes.additional_details:
Thousands of people who are arrested and later found innocent are being punished by the media with their full names published all over the news. HM Goverment MUST ban media using the full names of people how have been arrested but not yet charged. Revealing full names of people who are later found innocent destroys lives of those who are innocent and it is utterly unfair and against their basic human rights.

Ban media using full the names of those  who are arrested but NOT yet charged!!!!!
